scenario: The 2024 World Series generated $714.29 million in domestic media revenue and drew over 30 million combined average viewers across North America and Asia. The estimated annual sponsorship revenue for the 2024 World Series was $814.80 million, with the largest sponsorship deals being joint between Nike and SeatGeek at $100 million annually, and T-Mobile's partnership with MLB at $60 million annually. The LA Dodgers, the winners of the 2024 World Series, are expected to receive around $35 million, while the New York Yankees, who came second, are expected to receive around $25 million. The total attendance for the 2024 World Series was 253,104 over five games, with an average attendance per game of 50,621. T-Mobile's partnership with MLB is worth an estimated $60 million annually, ranking it second in terms of annual sponsorship value.
